snippet: Japan’s former prime minister, once a supporter of nuclear power, now wants a total ban.
abstract: Editorial welcomes former Japanese Prime Min Junichiro Koizumi's stand against nuclear power, arguing country should begin a healthy debate on issue that has not occurred in the two and a half years since the Fukushima disaster; notes Japanese public is largely opposed to nuclear power, and there would be outpouring of support for renewable alternatives.
lead_paragraph: Japan’s former prime minister, once a supporter of nuclear power, now wants a total ban.
